metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36658 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Apache::Session::LDAP before 0.5, validity of the X.509 certificate is not checked by default when connecting to remote LDAP backends, because the default configuration of the Net::LDAPS module for Perl is used. NOTE: this can, for example, be fixed in conjunction with the CVE-2020-16093 fix.

criterions.comment: libapache-session-ldap-perl package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
